gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 100, Heat 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks close out the game on a 13-2 run as they come back from a 21 point deficit and defeat the Heat, 100-98. Jalen Brunson led the way for the Knicks with 24 points, three rebounds and three assists, while Immanuel Quickley added 20 points and four 3PM in the victory. Jimmy Butler (23 points) and Bam Adebayo (21 points, 12 rebounds) combined for 44 points for the Heat in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 2-1 in East Group B play, 9-6 in the regular season, while the Heat fall to 2-1 in East Group B play, 10-6 in the regular season.
